metadata.description: Werewolves are unleashed on the nexus and it is up to one man to prevent the Grimm Universe from being devoured by a hunger that never dies.  Roman, a ruthless and uncaring hunter, is on the tail of a vicious werewolf when he finds himself embroiled in a conspiracy that goes way deeper than any hunt he's ever been on. Horror and action collide in this new TIE-IN miniseries from Zenescope Entertainment!
metadata.name: Unleashed: Werewolves The Hunger
